About Me

Xyzzy Magic
I'm a friendly, supposedly amusing person that was evidently cursed with an "interesting life" well before I was born, and things became weirder from there. Thankfully, even though I'm perpetually waiting for the other shoe to drop, I can find something amusing about most situations I land in when it does -- provided the individual in peril is me, rather than somebody I care about!
